resources.string:
AndiCar is a free and open source car management software for Android powered devices. For more details see the About page.
Copyright Â© 2010 Miklos Keresztes.
All rights reserved.
 Thank you for using AndiCar!

AndiCar is a free and open source car management software for Android powered devices.

 For more informations please visit the project home page at https://code.google.com/p/andicar.

 For questions, bug reports or enhancement request don't hesitate to use the AndiCar issue system at https://code.google.com/p/andicar/issues/list.

 For other things you can send an email to andicar.support@gmail.com.

 Thank you for using AndiCar.
